General.Name: Deep Noid Inc.
General.Description: Deep Noid Inc. provides medical artificial intelligence solutions. The company offers its solutions under the DEEP:NEURO, DEEP:LUNG, DEEP:SPINE, DEEP:CHEST, DEEP:BREAST, DEEP:ENDO, DEEP:DENTAL, DEEP:FUNDUS, DEEP:PATH, and DEEP LIVER names. Its solutions analyzes clinical data related to diseases, such as medical images, including CT, MRI, X-ray, and pathological images dealing with disease-related cells and tissues, and electronic medical records (EMR) of hospitals. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
